seed_pair.known: It's difficult to think quickly enough to answer in time.
seed_pair.target: Es difícil pensar lo suficientemente rápido para responder a tiempo.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 strict GATE compliance
changes_from_previous: Generated with strict GATE validation against S0001-S0090
Progressive whitelist: words added only as LEGOs are introduced
All phrases validated word-by-word against whitelist

practice_phrases: it's difficult to speak Spanish with you
it's difficult to learn everything you said yesterday
es difícil aprender todo lo que dijiste ayer
it's difficult to remember what you said yesterday
es difícil recordar lo que dijiste ayer
it's difficult to speak as soon as you can
es difícil hablar tan pronto como puedas
it's difficult to learn Spanish when you don't have time to practice
es difícil aprender español cuando no tienes tiempo para practicar
it's difficult to remember all the words I need to learn
es difícil recordar todos los palabras que necesito aprender
S0091L01.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0090 LEGOs only

practice_phrases: I want to think about it
it's difficult to think in Spanish
I want to start thinking in Spanish soon
quiero comenzar a pensar en español pronto
it's difficult to think when you don't have time
es difícil pensar cuando no tienes tiempo
I'm going to try to think about what you said
voy a intentar pensar en lo que dijiste
it's difficult to think about everything that I need to learn
es difícil pensar en todo lo que necesito aprender
I'm trying to think about the words I have learned
estoy intentando pensar en las palabras que he aprendido

practice_phrases: it's difficult to think quickly enough
es difícil pensar lo suficientemente rápido

voy a intentar pensar lo suficientemente rápido para responder

S0091L04.molecular_rationale: Components: para (to/for) + responder (to answer) - referenced from S0027
